Subject: .NET 6 out of support 12th November 2024
Description:
We have been told by a Netwrix support representative that our version of PingCastle should support a higher version of .NET that version 6. However, after having installed version 8 and removing version 6, the web console just gives us errors that the .NET version is wrong.

Are there specific instructions, or a particular procedure to upgrade to a higher .NET version and subsequently and remove .NET 6, as in five days, this becomes a security failure for us and we'll need to remove or shutdown the product?

Thank you!
What_We_Know__c: We are aware of the need to upgrade ASP.NET from v6 as it ending the support life on 12/11/24.
Solution_Comment__c:
Symptom
ASP.NET 6 EOS this November 12th


Resolution
Upgrade to new version that supports ASP.NET 8
